statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, weight FROM patient_records WHERE blood_type = 'A+' AND height > 160;
SELECT patient_name, height, weight FROM patient_records WHERE weight BETWEEN 50 AND 70 ORDER BY height ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'M' AND blood_type IN ('O+', 'A-') ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, blood_type, weight FROM patient_records WHERE height > 170 AND weight < 70;
SELECT patient_name, height FROM patient_records WHERE blood_type IN ('A', 'B', 'O') ORDER BY patient_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT blood_type FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, address, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT record_id, doctor_name, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31'
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.doctor_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, appointment_date FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address, contact_number FROM Patients ORDER BY address DESC
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, prescription FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT doctor_name, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_name, appointment_date, reason FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, dob, insurance_id FROM Patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY dob ASC;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, doctor_name, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;

SELECT p.name, m.doctor_name, a.appointment_date FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id ORDER BY p.name ASC, a.appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, visit_date FROM Doctors JOIN Visits ON Doctors.doctor_id = Visits.doctor_id ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(visit_id) AS visit_count FROM Visits GROUP BY patient_id HAVING visit_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY record_id ASC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Doctors.doctor_name, Visits.visit_date FROM Patients JOIN Visits ON Patients.patient_id = Visits.patient_id JOIN Doctors ON Visits.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE prescribing_doctor = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT appointment_date, doctor_name FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_history WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, prescribed_on FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 2 ORDER BY prescribed_on ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance WHERE coverage_start >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, doctor_name FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
